overview:
Donna Sandifer joined SET Consulting in October of 2007 with an extensive instructional system design, training and technical writing background. Prior to joining SET, Donna worked for over 20 years in the training and analysis arena. At SET Consulting, Donna works in the areas of instructional design, documentation production and training delivery. Donna received degrees in Criminal Justice from the University of Akron and Law and Government from George Mason University, as well as a paralegal certificate from Old Dominion University.

Source: SET Consulting
